column5: http://www.wkyc.com/news/local/summit-county/portage-lakes-polar-bear-jump-2017-raises-160000-for-akron-canton-regional-foodbank/409573431  A new record high here today, 67f. The heat is making folks crazy! LOL
Warm here too...  Although I think people were crazy before it warmed up... Lol

LOL pics, I believe you may be right!  They are saying that we may break a record for the most consecutive days above 50 f in February that has stood since the 1930's here, like  8 days in a row? Winter here has been exceptionally mild, I don't think we have had more than 3 inches of snow on the ground at any one time.  That lake they are jumping in is right south of Akron Ohio, a series of small connected lakes, a bass factory! One of the few lakes here with homes all long the edges and a lot of fishing and boating traffic, a fun lake to fish.
It was pretty neat to be sledding over 3-4 ft of snow in +10 degree weather in February.
